FuncDef: This command copies existing QoS policy entries for a QoS policy ID to another QoS policy ID.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates that the source policy ID and the destination policy ID are HS policy IDs. Specify the source policy ID that the copy command attempts to copy from and specify the destination policy ID to which the command copies a duplicate of the policy.

Specifies to replace the existing destination policy. Everything in the existing destination policy is overwritten with the contents of the source policy. If overwrite is not specified, an error occurs if the destination policy ID exists.
